thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 8 of 122
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text:
A really first class service from the initial contact, through booking, updates prior to date of our flights and on our return to UK, the team could not have been more helpful with regard to our requests, Nathan kept in touch throughout and demonstrated excellent service and customer care. We have no reservation in recommending DialAFlight and intend to use them again.
J & J 01/09/2017
